original_text:
Fruit Combinator
In Fruit Combinator, nuova slot ReelPlay, troverete un innovativo meccanismo progressivo a cascata, 707 modi per vincere, un RTP del 96,1% e tanti Bonus!
Caratteristiche di Fruit Combinator
Tra i tanti temi sfruttati dai produttori di slot, al primo posto troviamo di sicuro quello della frutta, amato dalla quasi totalità dei giocatori. Con Fruit Combinator la ReelPlay ha cercato di creare un gioco che fosse diverso da tutti gli altri e a giudicare dal gameplay, dobbiamo ammettere che ci è riuscita in pieno.
Dal punto di vista grafico, siamo di fronte a un prodotto senza infamia e senza lode, i simboli sono ben disegnati anche se non hanno una definizione in HD e in generale è abbastanza povera di dettagli. La griglia di gioco è sospesa nel cielo, a destra abbiamo solo due tasti, lo Start e il Menù, a sinistra sono invece indicati i quattro jackpot.
Caratteristiche e meccaniche di gioco
Le meccaniche appaiono fluide, i rulli girano senza tentennamenti, segno che la ReelPlay ha lavorato bene sul software.
La griglia di gioco ha 6 rulli e 5 righe, anche se inizialmente si gioca con 3 sole righe. Vedremo poi nel paragrafo dedicato alle regole di gioco come sbloccare le restanti posizioni.
I modi per vincere sono 707 e la vincita massima è di 6.224 volte la puntata, che parte da un minimo di 0,20 €.
Dal menù è possibile attivare da 10 a 1.000 giri automatici senza bisogno di inserire limiti di vincita o di perdita.
La volatilità è bassa, il ritorno teorico al giocatore (RTP) è del 96,1%.
Come si vince a Fruit Combinator
Per vincere è necessario creare combo di almeno 3 simboli partendo dal rullo di sinistra e procedendo verso destra.
Come in tutte le slot, anche qui i reali dal 10 all’asso hanno un basso valore, mentre a pagare di più sono la fragola, l’anguria, l’arancia, la prugna e l’uva. Per avere un’idea chiara sui premi, consigliamo comunque di dare un’occhiata alla tabella dei pagamenti accessibile dal menù.
In Fruit Combinator è presente il Wild e lo Scatter: il primo sostituisce tutti i simboli eccetto lo Scatter; il secondo è rappresentato dalla stella e atterra sempre associato a un premio in denaro, oltre a ricompensare con 3 Respins durante i quali, ogni volta che si ottiene una combo vincente, il numero di giri ritorna a quello iniziale.
Vediamo ora l’innovativo sistema di gioco di questa slot. In pratica, ogni combinazione pagante dà avvio a un processo suddivisibile in 4 fasi, ognuna con un suo nome e una sua funzione

Explosion: i simboli che formano la combo esplodono e vengono sostituiti da altri del tutto nuovi.
Morph: i simboli vengono trasformati nel simbolo di più alto valore presente in quel momento sul fondo della griglia.
Booster: se dopo le due fasi alcuni simboli non risultano più vincenti, vengono aggiunti simboli identici per formare combo paganti.
Drop: Nelle colonne in cui ci sono meno di 5 simboli, vengono fatti cadere nuovi simboli che vanno a riempire la griglia. Se questi simboli non formano nuove combo, esplodono e vengono sostituiti da altri. Vengono invece mantenuti gli Scatter.


Domande Frequenti 
A quanto corrisponde la volatilità?

In questo gioco la volatilità è bassa.



Dove posso trovare Fruit Combinator?

Questo gioco a breve sarà disponibile su tutti i casinò italiani legali dotati di bollino AAMS.



Come posso provare la slot prima di scommettere soldi veri?

Collegandovi al nostro sito potrete testare la versione DEMO di Fruit Combinator senza limiti di tempo.

raw_translation.response:
Fruit Combinator is the new ReelPlay slot game with an innovative progressive cascade mechanism, 707 ways to win, an RTP of 96.1%, and plenty of bonuses! Among the many themes used by slot producers, fruit is undoubtedly at the top, loved by almost all players. With Fruit Combinator, ReelPlay has tried to create a game that is different from all the others, and judging by the gameplay, we must admit that they have succeeded in full. 

From a graphic point of view, we are faced with a product without infamy and without praise, the symbols are well-drawn even if they don't have an HD definition and, in general, it is quite poor in details. The game grid is suspended in the sky, on the right we only have two buttons, Start and Menu, while on the left the four jackpots are indicated. The mechanics appear to be smooth, the reels spin without hesitation, a sign that ReelPlay has worked well on the software. 

The game grid has 6 reels and 5 rows, even if initially, you play with only 3 rows. We will see in the paragraph dedicated to the rules of the game, how to unlock the remaining positions. The ways to win are 707, and the maximum win is 6,224 times the bet, which starts from a minimum of €0.20. From the menu, it is possible to activate from 10 to 1,000 automatic spins without the need to insert win or loss limits. The volatility is low, and the theoretical return to player (RTP) is 96.1%. 

To win in Fruit Combinator, it is necessary to create combinations of at least 3 symbols starting from the left reel and proceeding to the right. As in all slots, here too, the royalty from 10 to ace has a low value, while paying more are strawberry, watermelon, orange, plum, and grape symbols. To get a clear idea of the prizes, we still recommend taking a look at the paytable accessible from the menu. In Fruit Combinator, the Wild and the Scatter are present: the first replaces all symbols except the Scatter; the second is represented by the star and always lands associated with a cash prize, as well as rewarding with 3 Respins during which, every time a winning combo is obtained, the number of spins returns to the initial one. 

Now let's see the innovative gameplay system of this slot. In practice, every paying combination starts a process that can be divided into 4 phases, each with its own name and function. Explosion: the symbols that form the combo explode and are replaced by completely new ones. Morph: the symbols are transformed into the symbol of the highest value present at that moment on the bottom of the grid. Booster: if, after the two phases, some symbols are no longer winning, identical symbols are added to form paying combos. Drop: In columns where there are fewer than 5 symbols, new symbols that fill the grid are dropped. If these symbols do not form new combos, they explode and are replaced by others. Scatters, on the other hand, are retained. 

FAQs: What is the volatility of the game? In this game, the volatility is low. Where can I find Fruit Combinator? This game will soon be available on all legal Italian casinos with an AAMS stamp. How can I try the slot before betting real money? By accessing our website, you can test the DEMO version of Fruit Combinator without time limits.

In Fruit Combinator, there is the Wild and the Scatter: the first replaces all symbols except the Scatter; the second is represented by the star and always lands associated with a cash prize, as well as rewarding with 3 respins during which, every time a winning combo is obtained, the number of spins returns to the initial one.

Now let's see the innovative game system of this slot. In practice, every paying combination starts a process that can be divided into 4 phases, each with its own name and function.

Explosion: the symbols that form the combo explode and are replaced by completely new ones.

Drop: In columns where there are less than 5 symbols, new symbols are dropped to fill the grid. If these symbols do not form new combos, they explode and are replaced by others. The Scatters are instead kept.

All in all, the graphics in Fruit Combinator are fine but nothing exceptional. If you're looking for a beautifully-rendered game experience, you might want to look elsewhere. But if you're happy with decent graphics and great gameplay, then give it a spin!

Review:
 
Gameplay mechanics

Fruit Combinator by ReelPlay has been designed to offer players a unique and innovative gaming experience. The game grid comprises of 6 reels and 5 rows, and there are a total of 707 ways to win. The game offers an RTP of 96.1% and has a low volatility, making it ideal for players that want to enjoy a relaxing game. The graphics are not the most detailed, but the symbols are well-designed, and the gameplay is smooth. The game also boasts a range of bonus features that add to the excitement of the game.

Progressive cascade mechanism

One of the most innovative features of Fruit Combinator is the progressive cascade mechanism. Every paying combination starts a process that has 4 phases - explosion, morph, booster, and drop. In the explosion phase, the symbols that formed the combo explode and are replaced by new ones. In the morph phase, the symbols are transformed to the symbol of the highest value currently at the bottom of the grid. In the booster phase, identical symbols are added to form paying combos. In the drop phase, new symbols are dropped to fill the grid; if these symbols do not form new combos, they explode and are replaced by others. The Scatters are kept.

Available at legal Italian casinos with AAMS label

Players can enjoy Fruit Combinator on all legal Italian casinos that have the AAMS label. This ensures that players can play safely and securely without having to worry about the legitimacy of the game or the casino itself.

Demo version available on website

Players can also try a demo version of Fruit Combinator without having to wager any real money. This is available on the developer's website and offers players a chance to become familiar with the game's features and mechanics before investing real money.

Wild and Scatter symbols

Fruit Combinator offers both Wild and Scatter symbols. The Wild symbol replaces all symbols except the Scatter. The Scatter is represented by the star and always lands associated with a cash prize, as well as rewarding with 3 respins during which, every time a winning combo is obtained, the number of spins returns to the initial one. These features can add extra excitement to the game and help increase a player's chances of winning.
